main event: An unidentified flying object was reported to the Air Force at 1655EST, described as a smoke trail with gray color, observed in Atlanta, GA.
interesting points: The object was reported to travel at a very fast speed of 1200 to 1500 MPH,The observer claimed to have sighted many unidentified objects in the past,There was a corroborating witness present during the sighting,The sighting lasted for a few seconds,The object disappeared from sight and made no sound.
witness description: One witness who served several years in the Navy and a friend who corroborated his story.
